# Journal
A simple journal application using GTK.

## Installation

From pypi:
```
pip install epiccakeking_journal
```

From source:
```
git clone https://github.com/epiccakeking/journal.git
pip install ./journal
```

Run without installing:
```
git clone https://github.com/epiccakeking/journal.git
python journal/epiccakeking_journal
```
